verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I <S%G191>heard,<s%> as it were, a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> of a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G239>"Hallelujah!<s%> <S%G4991>Salvation<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G1411>power<s%> belong to our <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G3754>because<s%> His <S%G2920>judgments<s%> are <S%G228>true<s%> and <S%G1342>righteous;<s%> for He has <S%G2919>judged<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4204>harlot<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> was <S%G5351>corrupting<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> with her <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> and He has <S%G1556>avenged<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of His bond-servants on her. "
And a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>time<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G239>"Hallelujah!<s%> Her <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G305>rises<s%> up <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>"

And the <S%G5064>twenty-four<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> and the four <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G281>"Amen.<s%> <S%G239>Hallelujah!<s%>"

And a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> from the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G134>"Give<s%> <S%G134>praise<s%> to our <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> you His bond-servants, you who <S%G5399>fear<s%> Him, the <S%G3398>small<s%> and the <S%G3173>great.<s%>"

And I <S%G191>heard,<s%> as it were, the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> and as the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters<s%> and as the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G1027>peals<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G239>"Hallelujah!<s%> For the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> our <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> <S%G936>reigns.<s%>

"Let us <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> and be <S%G21>glad<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> to Him, for the <S%G1062>marriage<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> has <S%G2064>come<s%> and His <S%G1135>bride<s%> has <S%G2090>made<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> <S%G2090>ready.<s%>"

And it was <S%G1325>given<s%> to her to <S%G4016>clothe<s%> herself in <S%G1039>fine<s%> <S%G1039>linen,<s%> <S%G2986>bright<s%> [and] <S%G2513>clean;<s%> for the <S%G1039>fine<s%> <S%G1039>linen<s%> is the <S%G1345>righteous<s%> <S%G1345>acts<s%> of the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G1125>"Write,<s%> <S%G3107>'Blessed<s%> are <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2564>invited<s%> to the <S%G1062>marriage<s%> <S%G1173>supper<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>'" And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G3778>"These<s%> are <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

And I <S%G4098>fell<s%> at his <S%G4228>feet<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> him. And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, "Do not <S%G3708>do<s%> that; I <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G4889>fellow<s%> <S%G4889>servant<s%> of <S%G4771>yours<s%> and your <S%G80>brethren<s%> who <S%G2192>hold<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> For the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4394>prophecy.<s%>"

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G455>opened;<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2462>horse,<s%> and He who <S%G2521>sat<s%> upon it [is] <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4103>Faithful<s%> and <S%G228>True;<s%> and in <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> He <S%G2919>judges<s%> and <S%G4170>wages<s%> <S%G4170>war.<s%>

And His <S%G3788>eyes<s%> [are] a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire,<s%> and upon His <S%G2776>head<s%> [are] <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1238>diadems;<s%> and He <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> [upon Him] <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G846>Himself.<s%>
And [He is] <S%G4016>clothed<s%> with a <S%G2440>robe<s%> <S%G911>dipped<s%> in <S%G129>blood;<s%> and His <S%G3686>name<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> The <S%G3056>Word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G4753>armies<s%> which are in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> in <S%G1039>fine<s%> <S%G1039>linen,<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> [and] <S%G2513>clean,<s%> were <S%G190>following<s%> Him on <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2462>horses.<s%>

And from His <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1607>comes<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G4501>sword,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that with it He may <S%G3960>smite<s%> the <S%G1484>nations;<s%> and He will <S%G4165>rule<s%> them with a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron;<s%> and He <S%G3961>treads<s%> the <S%G3025>wine<s%> <S%G3631><s%> <S%G3025>press<s%> of the <S%G2372>fierce<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>

And on His <S%G2440>robe<s%> and on His <S%G3382>thigh<s%> He <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G935>"KING<s%> OF <S%G935>KINGS,<s%> AND <S%G2962>LORD<s%> OF <S%G2962>LORDS.<s%>"

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> in the <S%G2246>sun;<s%> and he <S%G2896>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3732>birds<s%> which <S%G4072>fly<s%> in <S%G3321>midheaven,<s%> <S%G1205>"Come,<s%> <S%G4863>assemble<s%> for the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1173>supper<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G935>kings<s%> and the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G5506>commanders<s%> and the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G2478>men<s%> and the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G2462>horses<s%> and of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2521>sit<s%> on them and the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1658>men<s%> and <S%G1401>slaves,<s%> and <S%G3398>small<s%> and <S%G3173>great.<s%> "

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and their <S%G4753>armies,<s%> <S%G4863>assembled<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> Him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> upon the <S%G2462>horse,<s%> and <S%G3326>against<s%> His <S%G4753>army.<s%>

And the <S%G2342>beast<s%> was <S%G4084>seized,<s%> and with him the <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophet<s%> who <S%G4160>performed<s%> the <S%G4592>signs<s%> in his <S%G1799>presence,<s%> by <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4105>deceived<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> his <S%G1504>image;<s%> <S%G3588>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> were <S%G906>thrown<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> into the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> which <S%G2545>burns<s%> with <S%G2303>brimstone.<s%>

And the <S%G3062>rest<s%> were <S%G615>killed<s%> with the <S%G4501>sword<s%> which <S%G1831>came<s%> from the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of Him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> upon the <S%G2462>horse,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3732>birds<s%> were <S%G5526>filled<s%> with their <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
